personalInfo.name: Nadeem Ali
personalInfo.title: Site Reliability Engineer | DevOps | Cloud Automation
personalInfo.summary: SRE & DevOps Engineer with 10+ years of experience in production reliability, automation, and cloud infrastructure. Skilled in Python, Kubernetes, Airflow, CI/CD, and observability tools with a strong background in trading and large-scale systems.
personalInfo.about: As an SRE, I focus on building reliable, scalable, and observable systems that automate everything from deployments to incident recovery. I blend my experience in trading platforms and production support with modern reliability practices ‚Äî SLIs, SLOs, and error budgets ‚Äî to create resilient services that delight users and scale effortlessly.

items.title: Site Reliability Engineer / Technical Specialist
description: Implemented monitoring, alerting, and automation pipelines to improve reliability for trading systems using Python, Shell, and Airflow.
Designed observability stack using Grafana, ELK, and AWS CloudWatch, reducing MTTR by 35%.
Built data ingestion pipelines integrating Charles River Trading data with Snowflake for automated reporting.
Collaborated with developers and business to define SLIs, SLOs, and error budgets across trading applications.

items.title: DevOps Engineer (Support Engineer III)
description: Enhanced production reliability for large-scale eCommerce systems with CI/CD, AWS, and Terraform.
Automated issue triage and ticket resolution using Python-based self-healing scripts, cutting manual L2 workload by 40%.
Created build and deployment pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions for internal tools.
Configured CloudWatch dashboards and alarms for proactive detection of system anomalies.

items.title: Senior Analyst Programmer
description: Managed application reliability and release pipelines for research systems supporting portfolio managers.
Led early adoption of cloud-native architecture, initiating migration from on-prem to AWS.
Automated data refresh and testing workflows using Python and Control-M.
Implemented continuous improvement initiatives using postmortems and RCA analysis.

items.title: Software Engineer
description: Supported and enhanced trading applications (Imagine DB) with focus on uptime, data integrity, and resilience.
Optimized incident response processes and automated reporting pipelines using SQL and Shell scripts.
Collaborated with global SRE and development teams to ensure compliance with reliability SLAs.

categories.title: SRE & Reliability
categories.items: SLIs/SLOs, Error Budgets, Incident Management, Postmortems, Root Cause Analysis, Reliability Automation

categories.title: Programming & Automation
categories.items: Python, Shell Scripting, SQL, Data Pipelines, Airflow, Snowflake, Automation Frameworks

categories.title: DevOps & Infrastructure
categories.items: CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions), Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CloudFormation, Autosys, Control-M

categories.title: Monitoring & Observability
categories.items: Grafana, ELK Stack, AWS CloudWatch, ITRS Geneos, Incident Response Workflows

categories.title: Cloud Platforms
categories.items: AWS (EC2, RDS, IAM, S3), Azure (AKS), GCP (Cloud Run, Monitoring)

items.title: SRE Data Pipeline Automation
items.description: Developed an automated data pipeline using Python, Airflow, and Snowflake to collect, transform, and visualize reliability metrics (SLIs/SLOs). Improved incident prediction accuracy by 30%.

items.title: Trading Platform Reliability Improvement
items.description: Implemented monitoring, alerting, and deployment automation for Charles River OMS, ensuring 99.9% uptime. Reduced mean time to detect incidents through ELK and CloudWatch dashboards.

items.title: CI/CD Standardization Initiative
items.description: Created reusable Terraform and Jenkins modules for multi-environment deployments across applications, reducing release cycle time from 2 days to 4 hours.

items.title: Hands-On Essentials: Data Application Builders Workshop
AWS Certified AI Practitioner Early Adopter
DevOps Beginners to Advanced with Projects
B.Tech ‚Äî Computer Science & Engineering
items.description: Graduated with First Division (69%). Actively led technical events and workshops on programming and automation.

items.title: Senior Secondary Education
items.description: Had completed my SSE with science stream and scored 65% marks. Had participated in several types of events and competitions.

items.title: Secondary Education
items.description: Had completed my Secondary Education with science stream (English Medium) UP Board and scored highest marks in Maths and Physics in my area.

meta.title: Nadeem Ali | Site Reliability Engineer
meta.description: Nadeem Ali - SRE & DevOps Engineer skilled in reliability, automation, and cloud-native systems. Portfolio showcasing experience, skills, and reliability-focused projects.
